title: Single Daddy Seduction
description: Forbidden never tasted so good.  Sarah  He’s my daddy’s best friend, and he took a huge chance on me. I wasn’t meant to thank him by falling into his bed, I was just meant to care for his twins. But my life has just imploded and he’s the only good thing I’ve got right now.  Emmet  She’s my best friend’s daughter. Completely off-limits and yet I simply can’t resist. I need her to look after my babies, but I want her for myself. She’s the first good thing to come into my life since my wife died.  But is our forbidden romance our chance at a fresh start or will we be forced apart before it even begins?
author: Angel Devlin
